Blog.post: Ok i am dam bloody fed up today because of one stupid guy in my class we were having our last lesson which is maths lab lesson and we were doing quite well at first when this dumb guy talks he was like "hey wat the f***k is this man wat the f***k....... and it carries on and everyone one of use was like eh jordi pls la keep quiet leh but he goes on and on and on until sharon one of my classmate tabuletahan leh then say "shut up" and he actually replied her "bitch" and i was like hey wat kind of a guy is this calling a gal classmate a bitch infront of the class and the worst is it's not the first time already so i went hey jordi shut the dam hell up la and i was so fed up with his attitude that i wanted to go over and gave him a slap man, i would have done it if i wanted to find trouble with him. haiz dun wan to blog leh la think of him i sian already byebye

Hrm everything seems to be working fine right now excect i still haven quite figure out how to upload some of my ugly pics onto my blog leh hope some mates who accidently visited my site can tell me how. Hrm enough of crap i guess let me c wat happen today woke up dam early today morning just to check my bot(for online game) to make sure that it's still running after checking i was off to sch leh, haiz took me 45mins to reach sch how sian and the worst part was i had to stand for the whole of my trip ah wah piang wat is this y today so little ppl get off at city hall de make me stand until leg pain back pain only. Nehways i still make it to sch in one piece even though i was dozing off as i was walking to my class..... Break time haiz went to this stupid class leader meeting about going on a star virgo cruise trip for first year class leader haiz feel like going leh but still need to pay approx 160bucks leh where to find these kind of money so broke right nowleh still must pay money sch so rich only help us pay 60% make it 90% la then sure many ppl go one mah haiz realli stupid. After that was lesson on computer hardwares and we just went in for a quiz and some small experiment with the motherboard and off we go in half and hours time so lame a 2hr class cut sort to 30mins better dun go right haiz hrm guess i can only write till here leh cosz ermmmmmmmmmm got no bloody ideas wat to write anymore haiz so boring lets sleep ZZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzzzzz
Whew finally got my blog done hrmx also donno y suddenly wan to create this blog loh and i have a deep feeling that no one is gonna visit my blog haiz write more later lets testing first :>meowwww
